Profiling, the Key to Successful Information retrieval .A O'Dononue, C. H. A major tool employed to enter an information source is the search profile.. The development of an adequate profile depends upon the aids supplied by the data bases.. These aids vary in their content and depth and their proper use is essential for relevant information retrieval.. The data bases examined are CA Condensates, Index Medicus, and BA data bases.. Several searches are presented with a study of their comparative profiles.. .X 18	1	733 124	2	733 127	2	733 129	1	733 145	1	733 190	1	733 191	1	733 197	1	733 211	1	733 214	1	733 218	1	733 243	1	733 307	1	733 330	1	733 357	1	733 376	1	733 378	1	733 450	1	733 451	2	733 452	1	733 459	2	733 460	1	733 468	1	733 484	1	733 492	1	733 508	1	733 511	1	733 512	1	733 514	2	733 518	1	733 520	1	733 523	1	733 524	2	733 525	2	733 526	2	733 527	1	733 529	2	733 530	2	733 532	1	733 533	1	733 534	2	733 546	2	733 553	1	733 579	1	733 594	2	733 603	1	733 604	2	733 606	2	733 609	2	733 610	1	733 611	2	733 612	2	733 625	1	733 626	1	733 630	1	733 633	1	733 635	1	733 636	2	733 637	3	733 641	1	733 642	3	733 648	1	733 650	1	733 692	1	733 696	1	733 699	1	733 702	2	733 703	2	733 705	1	733 708	1	733 726	1	733 727	1	733 728	2	733 730	1	733 731	1	733 732	2	733 733	6	733 734	3	733 736	2	733 738	2	733 739	1	733 740	1	733 741	2	733 742	1	733 743	1	733 744	1	733 755	1	733 820	1	733 826	2	733 827	2	733 877	1	733 879	2	733 883	1	733 1004	1	733 1035	1	733 1078	1	733 1089	1	733 1091	1	733 1207	1	733 1264	1	733 1297	1	733 1303	2	733 1356	1	733 1364	1	733 1368	1	733 1370	2	733 1372	2	733 1373	1	733 1374	1	733 1375	1	733 1376	1	733 1377	2	733 1383	1	733 1396	1	733 1448	1	733 1448	1	733
